posts.description: In honor of Britain's upcoming special election, we've decided to proffer our own candidate with all the makings of a great politician: enviable hair, great style, and unmistakable intellect. He certainly has my vote, now I just need his. #ThisWayToMyBallotBox #ShowMeYourHangingChad #hotdudesreading #hdrfangram

Okay, to be fair... yes, you can't REALLY see how hot this Hot Dude is. But take my word for it, anyone reading next to a view this gorgeous has gotta be gorgeous himself. On second thought, I'm a little over this landscape. I should probably get a little closer to see the REAL view. Then we might as well get straight to the honeymoon since we're already abroad. #HoneyMoonMe #hotdudesreading #HDRFanGram

No need to go hunting for eggs when the prize falls right into your lap like this. I bet this one is hard and playful on the outside, and sweet and savory on the inside, just like those Easter eggs I've been searching for. Looks to me that those eggs won't be the only ones getting laid by some chick this weekend, either. #LentIsOver #NowComeOver #hotdudesreading #HDRfangram

I decided to take some time away from the rush of NYC to relax for a long weekend in LA, and it looks like this guy had the same idea. Reading classic Hemingway and patiently chilling out next to his drip coffee...nothing sounds better. I hope his appreciation for slow and steady ends with coffee, because I'm falling fast and hard. #CafeAuLay #LikeYouALatte #FrenchPressMe #HDRFangram #hotdudesreading

Popped across the pond to see the sights, and boy did London deliver.  I found this prince reading "Sleep Smarter," and all I can think about is offering to be his personal body pillow.  Ditch the book 'ol chap, I'll show you all the best methods to tire yourself out before bed and wake up in a great mood. #CantWaitToSeeHisBigBen #cheerio-o-o #hotdudesreading #hdrfangram

Well well well, look what we have here. Some sort of Wednesday two-for-one hot dude special, it seems. That's the kind of promotion I can get on board with and lord knows I like a good bargain. One train car, double the sexy #doublethepleasure #doublethefun #hotdudesreading

Spring may not quite have sprung, but someone else most definitely has. The heat coming off this hot tamale could melt the ice still on the ground faster than I can find the ðŸ”¥ emoji. But that's cool with me, 'cause I don't mind getting a little wet. #andwild #hotdudesreading

I don't know why, but #StPatricksDay always makes me a little friskier than usual. As soon as I saw this macho mustache this morning, I knew I was going to have to go bigger than the preschool "Kiss Me, I'm Irish" line. Instead, I'm going to ask if he wants to play my new favorite St. Paddy's Day game: Knick Knack Paddywhack. Why? Because it ends with #GiveThisGirlABone #HotDudesReading

I caught this salt 'n pepper stud reading a "Simple Man Guide" and now all of a sudden I'm thinking I shouldnâ€™t be so content with that vigorous 15-minute elliptical sesh I had earlier. Considering my heart rate started to rise just from looking at him, Iâ€™m pretty sure heâ€™d have zero problems keeping it up long enough to keep me hot and sweaty well into the late night hours. #pelvicthrustsshoulddoit #hotdudesreading

The new #Instagram feature got me thinking, "does a #HotDudeReading look better sitting down or standing up?" Sitting down, this suited stud has a calm and collected demeanor. Standing up (swipe right) he exudes confidence. A perfect combo if you ask me. Here I thought this would be an exercise in decision making, but he's proving to me that I'm down with any position. #LiterallyAnyPosition #YouPick #HotDudesReading

Good thing thereâ€™s a doctor in the house because Iâ€™m about five seconds from passing out in the presence of this first-year Med Stud. And just in case reading up on pediatrics made him forget how to resuscitate a grown-ass adult, these are the three steps Iâ€™m going to need him to follow immediately: Step 1 - hands on my chest.  Step 2 - lean in, lock lips and breathe.  Step 3 - repeat. #UseTongueIfNecessary #ItsNecessary #HotDudesReading

Are the books guys read on Manly Beach befitting of the name, or is this one of those ironic plot twists where he's actually reading Sheryl Sandberg? Well, twists in the story are always good, so let's hope he's learning how to #LeanIn #AndOut #AndIn 
#hotdudesreading #HDRFangram

Between the weather that can't decide if it's summer or winter, chaos in every headline, and the harsh reality that I just blew through another Valentineâ€™s Day with no actual valentine, I need some serious stability in my life. And it looks like this guy could be my perfect solution: cool, calm and collected. On second thought, I think Iâ€™m ready for another wild ride. #YouSayErratic #ISayErotic #hotdudesreading #HDRFangram

Looks like this weekend warrior comes fully-equipped and ready to roll into the long one with me. Little does he know the bike won't be the only thing he'll be riding later. Now, it's been some time since I've hopped on a Huffy, but it should be easy enough to push it into high-gear and turn this into a trip he won't forget. #NoTrainingWheelsNeeded #ButMaybeSomeKneePads #HotDudesReading
This Valentine's Day, help spread literacy, love, and other things, with #HDRthebook. Available now, link in bio. #hotdudesreading

Since my flight from LA is indefinitely delayed, I made a pit stop in the lounge for some relaxation and wine. Maybe it's my jet lag or maybe it's the 3rd glass I just started, but I'm pretty sure music started playing the second I spotted this priority-status prince with a paperback. Love is definitely in the air, but I hope my fantasy version of La La Land ends in the #UprightAndLockedPosition #ItsGonnaBeABumpyRide #HDRfangram #HotDudesReading

Bienvenido a Miami, indeed. My inner sorority star is a sucker for a dude in a backwards hat and messy hair, so when I spotted this fratty fella with a book in hand, I went full blown fan girl. I'd be down for a beer, book and the beach with him any day of the week. Top it off with my fourth favorite B word, bed, and I'd call that a perfect day. #ByFourthImeantFirst #AyyPapi  #hotdudesreading
